snippet: Overall vehicle sales in the United States rose 8 percent last month.
abstract: General Motors reports that sales rose 7 percent in April over same month one year earlier; steady climb has continued despite fallout surrounding recall of 2.6 million cars.
lead_paragraph: Overall vehicle sales in the United States rose 8 percent last month.

headline.main: G.M. Sales Increased 7% in April, Apparently Unaffected by Recalls
headline.print_headline: G.M. Sales Increased 7% in April, Apparently Unaffected by Recalls
